trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式
Unblock-File
Unblock-File
概要

trans-unit.source: Unblocks files that were downloaded from the Internet.
trans-unit.target: 將從網際網路下載的檔案解除封鎖。
語法
ByPath （預設值）
ByLiteralPath
描述

trans-unit.source: The **Unblock-File** cmdlet lets you open files that were downloaded from the Internet.
trans-unit.target: **Unblock-file** 指令程式可讓您開啟從網際網路下載的檔案。

trans-unit.source: It unblocks Windows PowerShell script files that were downloaded from the Internet so you can run them, even when the Windows PowerShell execution policy is **RemoteSigned**.
trans-unit.target: 它會解除封鎖 Windows PowerShell 指令碼檔案，因此您可以執行，即使 Windows PowerShell 執行原則是從網際網路下載 **RemoteSigned**。

trans-unit.source: By default, these files are blocked to protect the computer from untrusted files.
trans-unit.target: 這些檔案預設會被封鎖，以保護電腦免於不受信任檔案的損害。

trans-unit.source: Before using the **Unblock-File** cmdlet, review the file and its source and verify that it is safe to open.
trans-unit.target: 使用之前 **Unblock-file** 指令程式，檢閱檔案，其來源，並確認它是安全的若要開啟。

trans-unit.source: Internally, the **Unblock-File** cmdlet removes the Zone.Identifier alternate data stream, which has a value of "3" to indicate that it was downloaded from the Internet.
trans-unit.target: 就內部而言， **Unblock-file** 指令程式會移除 Zone.Identifier 替代資料流，其值為"3"，表示它從網際網路下載。

trans-unit.source: For more information about Windows PowerShell execution policies, see about_Execution_Policies (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=135170).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 Windows PowerShell 執行原則的詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Execution_Policies (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=135170)。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此 Cmdlet 是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。
範例
範例 1︰ 將檔案解除封鎖

trans-unit.source: This command unblocks the PowerShellTips.chm file.
trans-unit.target: 這個命令會將 PowerShellTips.chm 檔案解除封鎖。
範例 2︰ 解除封鎖多個檔案

trans-unit.source: This command unblocks all of the files in the C:\Downloads directory whose names include "PowerShell".
trans-unit.target: 這個命令會將 C:\Downloads 目錄中名稱包含 "PowerShell" 的所有檔案解除封鎖。

trans-unit.source: Do not run a command like this one until you have verified that all files are safe.
trans-unit.target: 除非您已確認所有檔案都是安全的，否則請勿執行這類命令。
範例 3︰ 尋找並解除封鎖指令碼

trans-unit.source: This command shows how to find and unblock Windows PowerShell scripts.
trans-unit.target: 這個命令示範如何尋找 Windows PowerShell 指令碼並將其解除封鎖。
參數
-LiteralPath
指定要解除封鎖的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Unlike **Path**, the value of the **LiteralPath** parameter is used exactly as it is typed.
trans-unit.target: 不同於 **路徑**, ，值 **LiteralPath** 完全依照其輸入，使用參數。

trans-unit.source: No characters are interpreted as wildcards.
trans-unit.target: 沒有字元會被視為萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: If the path includes escape characters, enclose it in single quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果路徑包含逸出字元，請將它括在單引號中。

trans-unit.source: Single quotation marks tell Windows PowerShell not to interpret any characters as escape sequences.
trans-unit.target: 單引號告知 Windows PowerShell 不要將任何字元視為逸出序列。
-Path
指定要解除封鎖的檔案。
支援使用萬用字元。
-Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。
-WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 顯示執行 Cmdlet 後會發生的情況。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行此指令程式。顯示執行此指令程式會發生什麼事。
未執行 Cmdlet。
CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。
如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。
輸入
System.String

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a file path to **Unblock-File**.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用管線傳送的檔案路徑 **Unblock-file**。
輸出
無

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 此 Cmdlet 不會產生任何輸出。
附註

trans-unit.source: The **Unblock-File** cmdlet works only in file system drives.
trans-unit.target: **Unblock-file** 指令程式僅適用於在檔案系統磁碟機。

trans-unit.source: **Unblock-File** performs the same operation as the **Unblock** button on the **Properties** dialog box in File Explorer.
trans-unit.target: **Unblock-file** 執行相同的作業 **解除封鎖** 按鈕 **屬性** 檔案總管] 中的對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: If you use the **Unblock-File** cmdlet on a file that is not blocked, the command has no effect on the unblocked file and the cmdlet does not generate errors.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用 **Unblock-file** 檔案未被封鎖，此命令的指令程式的解除封鎖的檔案沒有作用，而且此指令程式不會產生錯誤。
相關的連結
about_Execution_Policies
Get-Item
FileSystem 提供者
